lyrics:
"Trap On Wheels" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Trap On Wheels" (feat. Young Scooter) [Hook:] I got a trap a trailer crown with pounds I got a van slamed down with pills Got a whip, got a stash for bricks I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (I got a trap) I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (I got a trap) I pull up and I hit you with this (I'm pulling up) I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (skeet) [Verse 1:] Got a trapper and the trail went global Rollin' drug store my trap went mobile Fifty thousand on a motorolla 60 pounds in the damn Corolla I lost a sister she a hell of shoulder She kept her mouth closed just like I told her When she get out I'm a buy her a Rover I got the crazy dope, my dope bi polar Helpin' hand, I put my hand on yo shoulder In the street I give you the cold shoulder Afford the lean and afford this blow I made a racing car outta my nose I hit a hundred thousand just in the motor So when I pull up on you niggas it's over I'm smokin' purple right in front of you workers, I'm in the zone Got a hundred Zones, will knock out yo business don't use the phone Betta watch yo tone of voice, fuck boy I got a tone Got a gun that kill an elephant nigga, don't get me wrong I put my trap house on Forgis nigga, I'm in the zone Baby bottles, gotta pistol and a scale inside [?] [Hook:] I got a trap a trailer crown with pounds I got a van slamed down with pills Got a whip, got a stash for bricks I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (I got a trap) I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (I got a trap) I pull up and I hit you with this (I'm pulling up) I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels (skeet) [Verse 2:] Mr. Ice Cream man, but I ain't got no fuckin' ice cream It's a traphouse on wheels, ice cream truck with Forgis Got dope, for sure, who made this beat? C4 Who got the streets? You know, you niggas don't rap bout dope You still haven't jumped off the porch, private jet to New York Made of steel, won't bend, I say nothin' in court Guwop got a trap on wheels Guwop got a trap on wheels Since enrolled, trappin' at my mommas shill [?] If ya a trap nigga, I know you're gonna trap, that is [Hook:] I got a trap a trailer crown with pounds I got a van slamed down with pills Got a whip, got a stash for bricks I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels I pull up and I hit you with this I got a muthafuckin' trap on wheels if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
